channel.title: Items
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to add items to my server? I'm not sure which file it goes in because I'm new to this, but I do have the coding.

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

xhellgiverx:

There is no class8.java in my source, or client. Yes I did look everywhere for it :\

thats because items are added through the client, not the source.

Read full topic

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

My suggestion is if ur new start with a server thats not 562, 562’s in first place are buggy as hell and second hard as hell to code… just for simple things to. I’d start out with a “Delta” and then once you get good i’d move to a PI sooner or later you can move to 508-525-ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

you may need these if you cant find out how to use them by at least using the search bar then you don’t need them

[code=java] case 13362:
itemDef.modelid = 62714;
itemDef.name = “Torva full helm”;
itemDef.description = “Torva full helm.”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 672;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 85;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62738;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62754;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
case 13360:
itemDef.modelid = 62701;
itemDef.name = “Torva platelegs”;
itemDef.description = “Torva platelegs.”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 474;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62743;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62760;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;

case 13358:
	itemDef.modelid = 62699;
	itemDef.name = "Torva platebody";
	itemDef.description = "Torva Platebody.";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 1506;
	itemDef.modelRotationY = 473;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 2042;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 62746;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 62762;
	itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Find the models first and if your using PI you need make a “raw” folder and put them in there, its were all your custom items go then add ints for placement. And finnaly go to item.cfg and set stats\item id\name\price in stores

Read full topic
